mulu mudala 122000/=athata 53000/= (4700 ×24 )yathurupadiye siyaluma liyakiwili sahithayi.> obata awashya siyaluma indiya yathuru padi wikinima miladi ganima ha huwamaru kirima.> obata awashya siyaluma indiya yathurupadi sandaha lisin pahasukam> kadinam ha suhadashili wishwasaniya sewawa.> awashya liyakiwili> naya pahasukama labaganna ayage padinchiya thahawuru kara gramasewaka lipiyak> ohuge jathika hadunuumpatha> paspot pramanayen chayarupa 4k.> sakshi karawan sandaha awashya wanne jathika hadunumpath deka pamani.> (yathuru padiya pariksha kirimen pasu mila ganan pilibandawa sakachcha karanu labe.)> ihatha liyakiyawali samaga pamina sathiye sama dinakama sewawa labagatha haka .

badagostharawadi deshapalanaya nathara kara aagamika sanhidiyawa athi kirimata kalaya elambaa athayida arjuna ranathunga amathyathuma pawasiya... 2030 warshaya wanawita kolambaa waraye bahalu meheyuma miliyana 30 dakwa wadikirimata apeksha karana bawa waraya saha nawika amathyanshaye lekam el.pi. jayampathi mahatha pawasayi. 2030 di ema ilakkaya sapura ganimata kolambaa waraya dan pawathina pramanayata wada saya gunayakin wishala kala yuthu bawada ethuma penwa deyi.

ithin ohu duta ki de sabawaki.adata mata wayasa wisi ataki, ma dan awurudu ataka diyaniyakage mawaki.eheth adatath ohuta ma punchi ekiyaki.ohu aadaren senehasin atha patha ga hadu mage bala wiya apema diyaniyagen nawatha daka daka winda winda maha sanasumak labayi.eda patan ada wena thuruma siyalu domnas ee karata gena somnasama pamanak mata di ohu sanaseyi.koyi tharam kal giyada koyi tharam wayasata giyada hamadamath ohuta ma ladariyaki.eya welawakata hithata maha barak unida ee senehasa langa ma sabawatama jiwithaya windimi.ma apamana senehasin nidana ee nethu desa bala sitimi.dasa wasa genama sudu ayiya mawath diyaniyawath depasin ee layata thurul kara gaththeya."
